message.body: Total panic mode. The credit union that's been so totally frustrating denied my loan.
What was their reasoning? Hadn't they made it sound like it would go through? Have you looked into credit cards? Damn
Not enough income, they didn't have info about my job yet so I'm sending that to them and trying another cred union. I'm freaking out though
Me too
I need some kind words
I wish I had the money you needed. I'd give it to you in a second. And I wish i was there to help you work through this. We'll figure something out
It's just a matter of finding someone who will give me money and pig iron will Have to wait
Will pig iron wait? I thought the credit union was their idea.
It was. They're aware of that
OK...I'm glad they won't mind waiting

Enid's helping me out. If they dont fund me pig iron will pull their membership. Lots of irons in the fire with this. I'm just totally stressed and wish I didn't owe so much literally and figuratively
So I did over draught. At what point do I constitute a huge failure?
So not a failure just struggling to get settled. I put $500 into your account. That should help with rent and other payments coming up. Penney's is taken care of. OK? I love you.
How are you doing?
Rough, the woman helped though
So you went to the chiropractor?
I did, it was easiest. $60 total, pig iron should cover it though
I'm really glad it helped. Do you have pain medicine?
Ibuprofen
You should do some of your yoga breathing to help relieve the stress held in your body .... you've had a lot of stress lately. I love you matt.
